1362550.name: The Ocean
1362550.description:
You are the only surviving sailor from a pirate crew. The angry ocean waves bring you on the beach of a tropical island.

Hunt, craft, build, kill other pirates enemies and explore the all of the islands.
In this first person survival you can:
  • Build your amazing base, by chopping down trees, finding rocks and sticks
  • Hunt animals to keep you from starving and find clear water to drink
  • Craft powerful weapons by gathering resources across the map
  • You can explore the tropical islands archipelago or defend your base against enemy pirate crews
1362550.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
